name: The Mall (IcarusoofDev)
description:
Welcome to The Mall, a Horror Shopping Game!

Here is how to play:

Use the shopping list to identify the quantity of each item, once you collect it, put it in the shopping cart and once the list is completed, you may exit through the door behind you. Just be careful not to run into Greg.

This was a game developed in 48 hours by a IcarusoofDev, 13-year-old game developer.

Be sure to check out my Youtube Channel or support it on Patreon, join our Discord Server!

I'll release a devlog video on this game soon!
